originalText.text: I called in to find out about their services, the receptionist on the phone had an attitude and did not listen and repeated the same information word for word. I had to interrupt her just to get the answer I needed instead of irrelevant "information" referring me to a website to get rid of me. Your front desk staff needs to learn how to actively listen and drop the attitude. You guys lost a customer/patient. RUDE! RUDE!

originalText.text: My experience was beyond exceptional! I‚Äôve been to Urgent Cares all around the city & have always experienced rude workers/people that can careless about you being there. Front desk was timely & very welcoming, I can‚Äôt remember his name but the man with the glasses at reception was a delight! Not to mention, I waited only 10 minutes after check-in! üòä

originalText.text: Leaving 1 star just to be nice. Had a terrible experience with people who pretty much don‚Äôt know what they are doing. Went in to get my hearing checked instead of visiting an ENT specialist since I didn‚Äôt have the time. After giving me some nonsense diagnosis I visited a doctor at NYU Langone who sorted me out in 3 minutes at a lower price and even told me that what the urgent care said to me about my issue was outright ridiculous. Save your time and money and go to NYU Langone to consult real medical professionals.

originalText.text: I‚Äôve always been pleased with ProHEALTH, the staff is so friendly and helpful. the wait time was about an hour but the receptionist at the front desk was kind enough to offer to give me a call once they were ready for me so I could step out and wait but I decided to wait in the office. The way people were speaking to the staff about the other people in the room is not okay, a woman was yelling at the front desk and angrily questioning the staff on why they would let in a ‚Äúconstruction worker‚Äù before her‚Ä¶ Its upsetting to see that a facility that I always go to accommodating someone who openly degrades people because of their jobs. I don‚Äôt feel comfortable coming here anymore until I know the company will stand up for others and their employees.

originalText.text: Just had a genuine 5-star experience here. After going to two different urgent care clinics after work hours and being told that I wouldn‚Äôt be able to be seen, I randomly found ProHealth, and they had an appointment open 15 minutes later that I booked online. I was greeted promptly, and my insurance and information was processed in a timely manner despite being a new patient. The medical assistant that took my vitals was very personable and warm. The true star of my visit though was Dr. Richard Marino. He was very kind, listened to my medical issues with a nonjudgmental manor, and took his time/made sure he was thorough with the visit. He explained what each medication he was prescribing was for thoroughly and clearly, as well as provided some over the counter things I could take to help. I definitely had a great experience and would come back for urgent care assistance.
